title: Rapid detection and quantification of melamine, urea, sucrose, water, and milk powder adulteration in pasteurized milk using Fourier transform infrared (FTIR) spectroscopy coupled with modern statistical machine learning algorithms
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Chu Chu, Haitong Wang, Xuelu Luo, Yikai Fan, Liangkang Nan, Chao Du, Dengying Gao, Peipei Wen, Dongwei Wang, Zhuo Yang, Guochang Yang, Li Liu, Yongqing Li, Bo Hu, Abula Zunongjiang, Shujun Zhang
